reviews.review: Со временем игра скатывается в яму с гавном. Комьюнити нулевое, найти адекватных игроков почти нереально, баги, которые не исправили за несколько лет, система репортов вообще только для галочки, обновления оверпрайс, контента почти нет. Очередной проект с хорошим потенциалом, скатившийся в хайпомет за лавандос. 10 застрявших в текстуре игроков из 10

For new people dont even bother with this game. Everyone already has the best perks/offerings/ items so you'll be at a major disadvantage as there absolutely no matchmaking put in place at all which completely blows my mind and the devs wont do a thing about it. The play with friends is a complete joke; its one of two things either: it finds a game and then realises theres not enough space for all of you and says no games found... it only tried to find 1 game; The killer quits because they know that their all talking to each other. This game has potential but lacks in all other departments! :(

So I'm 27 hours into this game and played it every now and then since it was released.
It's fun, but I can't recommend it at this state.

The game was released broken and it hasn't changed to this date.
I mean it's a complete bugfest.
To name a few reasons, why I can not recommend it at this state:
[list]
[*] Getting stuck while picking up a survivor (Both will be unable to do anything)
[*] Getting stuck in walls
[*] Getting stuck in the damn hook
[*] Getting deranked and denied of your earned points because of real bad coding by the devs
[*] Game not ending after killing all 4 survivors and crashing afterwards (Getting deranked and denied of your points in the process)
[*]Unable to pick up survivors
[*]Hitting through walls
[*]Really bad netcode
[*]Only having peer 2 peer and no dedicated servers, resulting in lag in many games
[*]Bad matchmaking (Want to start at level 1 and get matched against prestige people, getting utterly destroyed in the process? Then this is for you)
[*]Cheaters and Hackers
[*]Overpowered perks (Which would be okay if new players didn't start with 1 slot and a selection of shitty perks in the first few levels while getting matched against people with 4 ultra rare perks)
[*]Only one game mode
[*]Devs implement more bugs than they fix

Don't listen to any of the negative reviews on this game. This game is no differerent than any other new game, it has it's issues, but it has way more positives! This isnt the 1990's anymore, when a game is relesed its going to need its balancing and the devs are doing that. The game costs only 20$ and on sale you can pick it up for less. I have over 100 hours in this game, and not even close to being bored of it. Pick it up try it out and have fun!

Почините уже лобби.
Ощущение (а уже кажется, что так и есть), что кидает фиксированное кол-во выживших. Кинет тебе четверых, но одна мразь обязательно ливнет, за ним последуют другие идиоты, и вот у тебя снова пустое лобби - кинет еще 2 людей и все, больше не положено. Сиди хоть сколько, но лобби не заполнится. Чаще всего остается 3 игрока и спустя время у одного из них лопается терпение и он ливает, однако, на его место заходит новый - снова 3 игрока; потом снова кто-то ливает и все идет по кругу.
Чтобы вылечить эту хрень, нужно пересоздавать лобби, но ведь теперь ты не просто создаешь лобби сразу же как раньше, а идет какой-то проклятый поиск (поиск возможности создания лобби?).

Overall it is a game using a famous genre among the folks as a concept w/ FRIENDS (not the public)
-problematic matchmaking (rank 5 above vs rank 15 below)
-very weird queue mechanics (need to constantly click "ready" again when the system can't find a match)
-A LOT OF GRINDING (ultra rare perks are not so rare when every player has them)
-heavy investment (40 hrs at least imo)
-point system favors campers vs the PERSON GETTING CAMP AS OF NOW. (read other player's opinions and change it)
-limited sound options, limited resolution option (but w/ the price, it's ok)
-the enemy killer (host) can cause in-game lag whether it is intentional or not

Still it's a good game to play with FRIENDS on a PRIVATE server just to scare people.

Best game i've played in a while..very enjoyable as either a survivor or a killer.. a bit imbalanced which is expected of a new-ish game, feel the game favours the killer in most aspects but enjoyable nontheless

At the heart this game is very fun, it could be a great game unfortunately the devs are very slow to address map and perk imbalances. 

The devs seem to spend an inordiant amount of time making new DLC's than fixing the problems of the games core mechanics.

Matchmaking is a joke if you are playing the role of the killer. Expect as a newbie killer to face survivors who have max'd perks and offerings.

Expect to be t-bagged and pallet looped ad naseum. Post game chat will give you high blood pressure from the salt you have to ingest from indignant survivors if you do manage to down a few of them.

Not to mention survive with friends survivor groups that have the added benefit of comms who can downright make playing as the killer a waste of time.

The game is heavily skewed in favor of the very vocal survivor group. Who out number killer players by at least 4 times.

I understand that I only have 30+ hours of game time and in almost every situation that isn't truly enough to write a full review of a game and all its aspects, but hear me out.

If you want to play as the survivor... You will NOT have fun. What I mean by this is you will 95% of the time either die straight away to the killer or simply be ignored by your team until you inevitably run straight into the killers hands anyway. It's not this that I find to be a problem because my instant reply to this is 'oh that's fine I'll just play killer'... But no, it's not that simple. My tasks are currently ALL related to being a survivor and are near impossible because I haven't spent 200 hours plus on the game maxing out my perks and becoming essentially invincible (which is basically required to actually win or have any sort of fun as the survivor) or abusing 'SAFEZONES'.

 Because of this I'm giving it a bad review, I thought I'd stick with the game and actually play a decent amount to give it a chance but after doing so I have come to the conclusion that for 80% of the people playing (4 survivors compared to the 1 killer) the game is simply not fun unless you spend countless hours constantly dying and grinding to get game changing perks. And to be quite frank, that should be a deal breaker for everybody.

Don't get me started on actually trying to find a lobby.

I really like this game. It can get a bit repetitive however it is very unique and after a short break i find myself coming back to it. Initially it is difficult but as you play more it gets much easier. The role of the killer is well balanced against the survivors. A bit more explaination of how the bloodweb works would be nice, however its not so hard to figure out that its extremely necessary. For me personally this game is a breath of fresh air in a world where so many games have become stale. I would like to see them add some more features however this game is very fun and one of the most unique games ive played. i highly recommend it if you like any kind of thrill or excitement it will get your heart pumping one way or another.

Reason for thumb down is due to bad lobby/waiting UI.
Firstly, I have to be always in front of PC even when I'm finding game since it won't auto find player.
Secondly, it took very long time to find a game for me during co op with my friends.  They were the main reason I bought this game but sadly till date, it wasn't quite a pleasure experience for all of us. Just so you guys know, I had 3 friends together with me and it sometimes took more than 30 minutes to get a single game.

This game is undeniably nice game to play but till they decide to do something about the Match Searching, I'm sticking with my thumb down.

Nunca busca partida por que la partida la tiene que HOSTEAR el asesino con su CONEXION y si no hay un asesino que quiera crear partida pues no juegas, ¿que ocurre?, que como el 90% de la poblacion que juega (que somos pocos ademas) son humanos (supervivientes), pues te comes las uñas (por no decir otra cosa), por que asesinos hay muy pocos que jueguen, quieran jugar, y creen partida, por lo que te encuentras hasta en partida rapida que no paras de darle clic al boton de buscar (que esa es otra, se suelta el boton) buscando partida, por que el sistema busca, ve que hay 0 partidas creadas por jugadores asesinos y no te une a partida, pues no existe, señores creadores, replantearos seriamente el sistema de busqueda y creaccion, ponerlo como dios manda, que las partidas se hosteen en vuestro servidor, que no tenga que ser un asesino el que cree la partida, que NO PUEDA IRSE la gente de la partida ANTES DE EMPEZAR (mas que nada por que eres jugador nuevo, te ven y se salen de la partida, y no juegas siendo nivel 1 ni a cabezazos), y bajarle el precio al juego, por que la gente ve 20€ por esto que ni se puede jugar y lo primero que hacen es meteros negativo y solicitar reembolso del dinero, asi que vosotros sabreis que camino quereis que tome vuestro juego, ¿quereis acabar como evolve f2p?, por que ese camino llevais e incluso peor, la idea del juuego bien, la creacion del juego lamentable, pero lamentable.

Questo gioco ha dalla sua un gamplay conivolgente, una bellissima atmosfera e la possibilità di alterare il quadro di gioco utilizzando appositi "sacrifici" i quali, una volta bruciati nel fuoco, pososno dare bonus e malus in egual misura ai sopravvisuti o all'assassino. 
Il sistema di controllo è semplicissimo, niete di più che nasconditi e utilizza oggetti con il sopravvisuto, stana e uccidi qualsiasi cosa con l'assassino.
Le prove di abilità sono una chicca, spesso ho trovato i sopravvisuti proprio perchè scoppiava qualche valvola e seguino il suono, così come i feriti che gemono terrorizzati anche se sono nascosti.
Unica GIGANTESCA pecca la si trova nel fatto che spesso, il mio assassino di livello 2 si è dopvuto misura con sopravvisuti di livello 20 o perfino 40! impossibile sentirli (grazie ai talenti sbloccabili salendo di livello) impossibile tenerli sul gancio sempre grazie ai talenti; lo stesso vale nelal parte del sopravvisuto; livello due, mi sono beccato un assassino di livello 32. inutile dire che sono morto a tre minuti dall'inizio del gioco. 
Se vi volete divertire davvero, senza sentirvi frustrati, giocateci con gli amici, altrimenti preparatevi a sessioni di gioco assolutamente impare. 
necessita sicuramente un miglioramento.

I have 163 hours of gameplay, and I can definitely say I recommend this game to anyone who wants an asymmetrical horror game.

This game perfectly captures the horror genre for survivors and killers. There's genuine tension when playing as a survivor, even before the killer actually shows up, and as a killer, you're almost compelled to sacrifice people any way you can.
The in-depth lore is definitely a big plus. For an asymmetrical horror game, the lore is surprisingly well written. It also ties into many game mechanics.

Despite what many salty players may say, the game is largely balanced. Win ratio for survivors and killers is roughly 50%, you can compensate for many perks and add-ons simply by being skillful, and the statistics the developers have presented show an equal percentage of sacrifices for almost every rank.

There are some bugs still present in the game, which is normal for any game this close to the release, but the developers are always working to fix them. They give us weekly updates on Twitch where they also answer our questions, five patches so far that addressed the biggest problems at the time, and even new content. Despite being a small team, they've proven their dedication to this game and its community.

The vocal community is largely unpleasant, to say the least, but the moderator team and many players are extremely helpful and willing to assist any way they can. As with any game, there are complaints from players who lost just because they lost, people who use bugs and exploits to their advantage, selfish players and so on. However, despite all this, I still recommend the game. These players don't stick around for long, and the developers are working on removing bugs and exploits anyhow, which will make for a more pleasant experience for everyone who does stick around.

All in all, taking into account the bugs, I'd give this game a 7/10, maybe even 8/10.

Seit dem Release von Dead by Daylight hat sich einiges getan. Es gibt mehr Karten, mehr Suriviver und mehr Killer. Sehr viel Bugs wurden über Monate hinweg nach und nach behoben. Langsam aber sicher fängt das Spiel an sich rund anzufühlen.

Das einzig Negative ist, dass das Spiel nach wie vor nicht einsteigerfreundlich ist. Der Grind in dem Spiel mit den ganzen Charakteren, die alle zu lvln sind, hat absurde Maße angenommen. Die Entwickler versuchen da zwar mit Blutpunkteevents und mehr Boni durch Offerings entgegen zu wirken, aber positiv spürbar ist das nicht. Casual Spieler müssen deswegen öfter Mal mit Frust rechnen, da die starken Perks erst durch sehr viele Blutpunkte freigespielt werden können.

Im Großen und Ganzen hat sich das Spiel aber schon gemausert.

Dead by Daylight. It's title already suggests it's nature. It's a gory, tense, some would say scary game which really does immerse you in a nostalgic experience of 1980's era slash movies. It definetely has a way to go in terms of bugfixing and the like as you can see, but I really don't think it takes away from the game itself. I recommend it for anyone, especially for the price.
wasted my money, so many bugs, and not balanced at all, please nerf survivors more and make it the worst game of the year.

While this game was appealing enough to get me to pay full price, the game itself falls short of expectations.

First survivors run almost as fast as the killer. Making chases take forever. The designaers feel the scratches on the ground should be enough to get you to track your target but they are near impossible to follow as you have to keep your eye on them AND your target. Ugh....

That isn't bad enough, there are pallets the survivors can drop down and dukes of hazard over. Sliding across them like they were the hood of a car and their rear ends were covered in grease. Extremely unrealistic. As the killer, you have to break the barricade down or go around and survivors will slide back and forth to lose you. Very annoying.

When I was watching videos, I heard that when the gates open up, you get one hit KO's on your targets.... sadly it's partially true as it's a PERK. REALLY?  It's the doors are open, it should go into sudden death without a freaking perk. Like the killer gets mad and trys extra hard to kill the survivors. THAT is more horror accurate than....you grazed him! There he goes out the door.

....And the killer's swing.... Wow. Okay, when you hit your target, he pauses and cleans the blood off his weapon. Cool. When he misses, he PAUSES AND LOOKS STUPID for the same exact amount of time. WHY???? We get it! He missed! Move on! Do the survivors really need MORE TIME to run?????

Also, if this is based on the horror genre, shouldn't the survivors have to...oh I dunno... REST FROM RUNNING? The survivors have nothing that makes them pause ever. Like at all. That image of someone ducking to hide to catch their breath you see in the horror movies? Not here.

And finally...saved the worse for last... the game CRASHES CONSTANTLY! I have to say it's about a 1 in 3 chance of crashing as that was my average. That sucks.

Game gets a 3 out of 10 for concept but the rest is pretty bad at this time.
Love the game :) Gimme that Achievement

Well, first the good: The devs are VERY active in the community and listen a lot, and make regular updates and changes to the game. Plus free content. Plus a weekly stream of Q&A, etc, etc... game has solid graphics, great sound... cool concept, and awesome art.

The Bad: Mostly the community. Biggest set of whiners and salty trolls ever. Also, zero AI in the game means everything is human controlled, and salty players make for a salty game experience. Don't be this salty guy. Be the guy with a great attitude! It's just a game!

The Ugly: Most salty players don't actually understand that this game is not an assymetrical 4 vs. 1. If you play it like that, no wonder why you are salty! You aren't getting hardly any points, and it feels like grinding! Guess what? It's actually a 5 player co-op. That's right. Play it like that, and score big time! Have fun! Smile and laugh... OMG! Where did the saltiness go?

躲猫猫

I will start off by saying that this is a fun game you play as a killer hit survivors to down them then hang their bodies on hooks to sacrifice them, or play as a survivor and work on generators to get an exit open to escape while avoiding the killer, but that fun is soon sapped out of the game when you run into these flaws.

1. Continual window hopping survivors. Now to be fair they have tried to address this issue but it's still an issue every map has at least 1 spot that survivors can run around in an infinite circles and it becomes a game of who's going to mess up first. Only problem is you wil get survivors who will not mess up and now you have to give up and go check generators or if all generators are done you have to wait for them to make a run for the exit. Which could be in 10 minutes or 30 minutes how ever long they feel like or until they mess up. 

2. TERRIBLE MATCHMAKING. As a survivor or killer I was constantly matched against killers/survivors who were 20, 30, even as high as 40 levels higher then me. Now for those of you who don't own this game what this means is im running around against a killer or multiple survivors who have high level perks which will buff them and assist them in some wayand they have multiple of these perks dues to their high level while you have 1 perk available and its a low level common perk. So let paint the picture for you, your the killer level 10 rank 20 you get matched against 4 survivors level 30, 35, 32, 45 you have 1 perk you can use say sloppy butcher ( makes them bleed more when you hit them), they all have 4 perks at their disposal lets say one has Saboteur (can disable your hooks and destory traps) and some other ultra rare perks to your common perk. You start the match finally knock down survivors to find there's no hooks nearby (due to saboteur) to hang them on and the nearest one is so far away that they can wiggle free from your grasp before you get there. Annoying huh? especially when all this could be avoided by matching you against players of a similar skill instead of throwing you in a blender against the best of the best as a new player.

Now some things to mention these problems could change and some of these problems could be addressed in the future but I would avoid this game until then. Now some people may be fine with grinding and being used as a punching bag to higher rank players until they can level up and rank up themselves but im not if your fine with it then you may not mind this game.

Игра действительно набирает популярность. Увы и ах, но не для кого не секрет что это своего рода новизна, а всего нового человек по своей природе боится.

Пару слов о маньяках:

Это милый бэмби не делающий присед на своих тренировках в свободное от охоты время. Это милое создание застающие вас врасплох за непонятным занятием в углу карты... в траве... в одиночестве... В моем представление он навсегда останется милым олененком, хоть и хрюкает.

Любимец публики и фаворит среди маньяков, а также харизматичный персонаж который по очередно напоминает то батю то соседа - соседа который любит пилить дрова в 6 утра и делать ремонт. Батю - потому что в майке и видимо он с похмелья. Не буду наносить не ому травму шуткой про то что их сосед возможно батя.

Единственный и неповторимый, кто не вызвал у меня приступ смеха ( на данный момент ), Маньяк с большой буквы, а именно Trapper. Капканы и вдумчивая игра, расстановка ловушек и, о боже, как же сладок этот момент, когда видишь пойманную душу в него. Особенно если она в порыве эмоций бежит от вас, будто вы хотите взять автограф.

 Игра построена на том чтобы в замкнутом пространстве не сглупить и проявить свою бессердечность. При всем уважении, но твои напарники более бессердечны чем Чудо которое бегает за тобой с бензопилой, а после вешает на крюк.

С этой игрой пополнился мой чёрный список. В основном это люди со скрытыми аккаунтами и подключенные к "РосТелеком" на дальнем востоке. Я думаю не надо раскрывать все проблемы с сетевым кодом, все и так все знают. 

Встречаю людей с 20 рангом и 3 престижем, но ради таких пишу пару коротких фраз в службу поддержки. Надеюсь, эти имбицилы перестанут играть в скором времени, а то больно наблюдать за ними, и даже даешь им фору чтобы они от тебя немного побегали.

ОХ ДА! Ещё одна отдельная категория людей, наигравших 20000 часов в Доту и кс чтото там только на этой неделе, поздравляю вас с задротством, но я повторюсь - следует хладнокровно мыслить, а не играть по шаблону.

Немного об этом. Я не стараюсь оскорбить людей или вызвать у них попаболь. Я прекрасно понимаю что одни люди, которые освоились или не очень, помогает другим, у которых ну никак не получается понять что держа мизинец на шифте, вы не создаете себе особую зону комфорта куда можете попасть только вы. Меня бы это устраивало, если бы я сюда ходил как на работу и моя зарплата зависила от того скколько я Blood Poits нафармил. Я люблю играть и надеюсь вы разделяете мое мнение, потому что я ох как не перевариваю людей которые из игр, которые делают из игры нечто темное и страшное. Встречаю людей которые предлагают просто фармить в организованной пати или просто встречаю таких кто досрочно договорился с убийцей чтобы за игру заработать как можно больше очков. Этакие рангодрочеры и "посмотрите сколько у меня ачивок за 15 часов несчастные нубы"( изначально конечно они созданы чтобы выжимать из вас деньги, но не будем о капитализме, эта игра не так дорога чтобы ставить на нее отрицательный отзыв только потому что ты застреваешь). Я бы советовал вам создавать игры отдельные от нормальных людей, кто заходит сюда получить удовольствие.

Говоря об удовольствие... Атмосфера тут удалась. И туманчик, и музычка, и сердцебиение, крики, вопли. Все эти стандартные и не очень штучки из фильмов ужасов. Я такие фильмы не люблю потому что, мои 100500 психологических тестов, да и оценка окружающих людей, говорят что я в меру безэмоционален. Но, играл я тут организованной группой по скайпу, и все играли слугой тьмы по очереди, и когда дошла очередь до девушки, то этих эмоций через письмо не передать и настоящему рецензисту или писателю. Пока она бегала за нами, я почти поверил что мы все мясо и поросятки.

Вывод: продолжайте слушать советы и читать обзорчики, мне с такими людьми приятно играть, чувствуйте игру и не будьте свиньей во всех смыслах. Не паникуйте и не разрывайте волосы у себя на жопе. Не используйте жульничевство, и играйте в приятной компании. В конце концов игра и идет к тому чтобы играть в нее с друзьями. Всем приятно игры и перестаньте уже удирать как школьники от папки с ремнем. Спасибо что дочитали

确实很好玩的游戏，至少我因此戒掉了炉石和屁股。推荐推荐

Where do I begin? 

Dead by Daylight on paper seems like the almost perfect asymmetrical multiplayer horror game you've dreamed about. An invincible killer hell-bent on slashing down survivors and putting them on hooks? Check. Plentiful maps with randomnly generated objects and items so as to keep each experience as unique as possible? Check. A team of survivors who can work with one another (or against each other) to power their way to escape while deviously evading the killer? Check. 

When just starting to get into the game, I though that Dead by Daylight greatly exceeded my expectations. As a survivor, I experienced some tense, nail-biting moments and an unsettling atmosphere with the constant trepidation that the killer might be alerted to my presence. As the killer, I enjoyed outwitting survivors as they tried evading and escaping me and toying with the survivors. 

However, as I began playing against higher level survivors as the killer I realized that many players are equiped with the saboteur perk. The saboteur perk enables a survivor the ability to permanently disable hooks (excluding the killer's basement hooks) and disarm traps (for the trapper killer). Now this sounds a decent idea, but in practice the saboteur perk in its current form is immersion breaking and gameplay breaking. The perk removes the sense of vulnerability as a survivor because a team of four survivors each equipped with the saboteur perk can quickly and quietly disable all the surface hooks. With the killer having no way to hook his caught prey and receive his reward for doing so, the survivors can run around the map with nigh immunity. As a consequence, this defeats the whole horror aspect. 

Another negative aspect I encountered was the presence of numerous bugs and glitches, in some cases game-breaking. For example, the killer when carrying a downed survivor may get stuck in a pallete if a fellow surivor drops it on the killer. With no way to become unstuck, the killer is forced to disconnect from the game. Since this is a $20 game, the bugs and glitches seriously need to be examined and fixed promptly. Until then, you may experience people, especially higher level players, actively exploiting these glitches. For me, this is game-breaking. 

Matchmaking is also another area of concern for new players. There are times when new players will encounter significantly higher ranked killers. For example, in my very first game playing as survivor (along with three other similar ranked survivors) I was matched up against a high level rank 11 killer. As you can guess, that match was very nerve-racking and did not end well for any of the survivors. Consequently, new players will have to endure frustrating and most importantly uneven matches. Additionally from my experience playing as survivor, most higher ranked killers are ruthless in crushing new survivors. 

In conclusion, examining the game as a whole I cannot recommend paying the full $20 for Dead by Daylight. There are still numerous bugs and glitches left to fix. Matchmaking really needs a reworking in order to balance players of unequal levels and ranks. Lastly, gameplay balance is needed to maintain the parity between the killer and survivor in higher level play (e.g. rebalance saboteur perk and hooks). 

Hopefully you found this review helpful.

This game SUCKS!!!

I originally gave this game a positive review but after i came back to it after a few months of not touching it i finally realize how terrible this game really is. It seems impossible once the killer find's you to lose them. And on top of this most of the time someone usually lags out in the beginning which makes it so you have less people to help out with the generators. AND ON TOP OF ALL THIS the game is literally FILLED with loading screens. I had to restart my game multiple times just to finally get into a match. And with the small playerbase it will probably take you at least five minutes to get into a lobby. 

The bottom line is you can definitely spend your money on something better than a game that isn't as broken and unbalanced like this one. So please, for your moneys sake, DO NOT BUY THIS GAME!

Hay poco que decir de este juego ya que , ha salido hace relativamente poco pero , me centraré en lo bueno que tiene el juego y , en lo malo ACTUALMENTE.

Dead by Daylight , es un juego de ''Horror supervivencia'' en el que cuatro supervivientes deben escapar de un bosque arreglando generadores y luego abriendo las puertas. Pero no todo es tan fácil. En la partida habrá un asesino el cual , se encargará de que eso no sea tan fácil o directamente no lo consigan. 

Actualmente el máximo de jugadores son cinco , cuatro supervivientes y un asesino. Esto se puede realizar también en partidas privadas con cinco amigos (las partidas privadas son totalmente para divertirse y no otorgarán puntos ni se podrá subir de rango)

El juego tiene una jugabilidad moderada. Con esto me refiero a que tiene unos controles sencillos y se aprende muy rápido a jugar. En ese aspecto todo está correcto pero , el problema viene dentro de las partidas. El juego está lleno de bugs , algunos son divertidos y estúpidos , otros , por lo contrario , te joden la experiencia de juego. ACTUALMENTE la mayoría de bugs surgen con ''El Espectro'' , un asesino capaz de hacerse invisible. También he de decir , que a veces los tiempos para encontrar partida son MUY ELEVADOS y puedes estar bastante tiempo para encontrar una (sobre todo por la noche). ADEMÁS de que el emparejamiento respecto a los rangos está mal (cosa que pueden , deberían y supongo que arreglarán) 

Respecto al diseño , debo de decir que está bastante bien. Han tenido en cuenta la historia de cada asesino para crearlos y ,  para crear su mapa respectivo respetando los detalles de la historia en cada mapa. 

La banda sonora , es algo importante para mi en los videojuegos. No solo puede aportar una sensación , sino que también puede aportarte una mayor inmersidad en el juego. En el caso de Dead by Daylight , la banda sonora es bastante escasa y muy sencilla aunque , a pesar de ser sencilla , el objetivo de aportarte mayor inmersidad lo ha conseguido sin duda (sobre todo el ''soundtrack'' de cuando el asesino te persigue) 

Cuando un juego se basa en enfrentamientos , como en este caso , asesino contra supervivientes , hay que tener muy en cuenta el balance. En esto no tengo mucho que decir. Hay muchos que se quejan de que los asesinos tienen mucha ventaja respecto a los supervivientes , y otros , que dicen totalmente lo contrario. Cada uno podría pensar de forma distinta en este aspecto , pero yo , lo veo por igual ya que , depende de la habiliad individual de cada jugador.

Si hay algo que me gusta de este juego , es que la compañía está al tanto de la comunidad. Actualmente siguen trabajando en el juego haciendo que evolucione poco a poco. Corrigen bugs y trabajan en nuevos proyectos como: nuevos mapas , supervivientes nuevos e incluso asesinos nuevos. Sinceramente se agradece que sigan evolucionando el juego poco a poco y me gustaría ver si finalmente consiguen un juego ''perfecto'' (debo de añadir que les queda mucho por hacer con el juego)

En definitiva , un juego estupendo. Sobre todo , para los fanáticos de estos tipos de juegos (survival horror). Recomiendo sin falta jugarlo con amigos ya que , así , os divertiréis mucho más. 

P.D: RESPECTO AL PRECIO , PUEDE QUE 19,99$ SEA UN POCO ELEVADO SI , PERO OS ASEGURO QUE OS SALE RENTABLE DEBIDO A LAS HORAS DE JUEGO Y DIVERSIÓN QUE OS DARÁ

2016'nın sonuna yaklaştık ve Ubisoft'un bile Assassin's Creed çıkarmadığı bir yıldan ayrılmaya az kaldı. Bu yıl, yıllardır beklediğim Dark Souls 3 çıktı ve o bile benim için hayal kırıklığıydı. Fakat ilginç bir şekilde senenin son zamanlarında bir kaç el atıp sıkılacağınızı sandığınız, çerezlik bir oyun olan Dead by Daylight kendi tarzıyla üzerinizde harika bir etki bırakıyor. İncelemeye oynanıştan başlayalım;

[h1]Oynanış[/h1]
Dead by Daylight gerilim-korku tadında bir aksiyon oyunu.

Oyunda seçebileceğiniz hayatta kalanlar ve katil sınıfı var. Bir oyun 4 survivor, 1 katil ile oynanıyor. 4 survivor katilden kaçmaya çalışırken kaçış kapılarını açmak için jeneratörleri aktif etmeye çalışıyorlar. Ayrıca etrafta toplayabileceğiniz sandıklar var. Katil bir kişiyi yakaladığında kaldırıp kancaya asabiliyor, bu süreç içerisinde kurban çırpınıp kaçabiliyor. Kancaya asıldıktan sonra takım arkadaşlarının onu kurtarması için uygun zamanı bekleyip arkadaşını kurtarması gerekiyor. Kancaya asıldığında "Attempt to Escape" olayı var ama bahsetmeye değmez %5 gibi bir şans. Aksi taktirde "Attemp to Escape" yapıp %5 tutmadığında kan kaybediyorsunuz ve daha hızlı ölüyorsunuz.

[h1]Hikaye[/h1]
 Dead by Daylight size hikayesini asla doğrudan anlatmıyor; hikayesinden parçalar öğrenebilmek için hikayeyi öğrenmeyi istemeniz gerekiyor. Ben kısaca oyunun gelişimini anlatacağım. Oyunda katiller "The Entity" adındaki mistik yaratık tarafından kendisine kurban sunması için yeniden doğduruluyor(Sanırım katiller normalde insan ve ölüyorlar). Survivor karakterlerimiz de her birinin kendine ait bir hikayesi var. Fakat sonuç olarak hepsi bir ormana giriyor ve kendilerine ulaşılamıyor. İşte bilmemiz gereken bu, "Acaba herşeyin başlangıcı Entity ile yüzleşebilecek miyiz?" "Oyunun sonu nasıl bitecek" "Gözlüklü şişko adam katilden kaçabilecek mi?".. Sorularınızın cevabı için Behaviour Ent.'den bir story mode bekliyoruz efenim :>

[h1]Matchmaking ve Rank Sistemi[/h1]

İşte oyunun gözümden düştüğü ve bir el atıyım da çıkayım dediği kısıma geldik. En kısa zamanda çözülmesini umarak abartmadan bahsedeceğim. 

Oyun, oyuncuları bir araya getirme konusunda çok başarısız. Öncelikle oyunu katil host ediyor ve katilin lobiden ayrılması, lobinin dağılması demek. 3-4 kere arkadaşlarınızla oyun bulmayı deneyip, en sonunda bulup daha sonra katilin çıkıp menüye atması çok sinir bozucu. Arkadaşlarınızla oynamak istediniz ve lobi açtınız. Herkes hazır çekti, oyun bulamadı. Herkesin çektiği hazır gidiyor ve tekrar tekrar hazıra basmanız gerekiyor. Bu çok büyük bir işkence haline gelebiliyor. Eğer tam takımsanız(5 kişi) şanslısınız demektir. Bu arada şu ayrıntıyı paylaşmamda fayda var; herkes kendi bölgesinden oyuncularla eşleşiyor. Yani genelde oyununuza türkler gelecek. Rank sistemi ise Hearthstone ile benzer tasarlanmış, bazen saçmalasa da konulması güzel bir incelik. Oyunda public olarak girdiğiniz her maç ranked olarak sayılıyor. 

[h1]Grafikler ve Teknik Detaylar[/h1]

Oyun atmosfer yönünden harika, özellikle harita tasarımı mükemmel. Grafikler de günümüz şartlarına göre eski dursa da bence tatmin edici. Işıklandırma güzel, sesler ciddi derecede harika. Kısacası oyun size istediğiniz deneyimi vermek için herşeyi çabalamış. Ayrıca kamera açılarını çok beğendim; gerek menü tasarımında, gerek oyun içinde size inanılmaz deneyim sunuyor. Kısacası oyun deneyim olarak size oyun içinde birşeyler sağlıyor.. ama oyuna girmek bazen sıkıntılı olabiliyor. 


 [h1]Müzik[/h1]
 Oyunda çok az şarkı duydum ama kulağa kaliteli geliyorlar ve oyundan sizi baymıyorlar. Katil olunca farklı, survivor olunca farklı müzikler çalıyor. Ayrıca oyunun atmosferine adapte olduklarını rahatlıkla söyleyebilirim.

[h1]Dead by Daylight[/h1]

 [b]-İyi Yönler[/b]

 -Kendine has zevkli oynanışı
 -Gerilimi gerçekten hissettirmesi
 -Atmosfer
 -Ses kalitesi

 [b]-Kötü Yönler[/b]

 -Matchmaking rezalet
 -Bugsuz oyun nerdeyse geçmiyor
 -Kısıtlı karakter düzenleme seçenekleri
 -Çökmeler

 Eğer arkadaşlarınızla beraber bir katilden kaçma deneyimini yaşamak istiyorsanız Dead by Daylight'ı denemenizi tavsiye ederim. Tek başınıza oynayınca da ayrı bir deneyimi oluyor tabii ki ama sonuçta oyun içi iletişim yok ve ne bileyim arkadaşınız olunca kesinlikle farklı bir deneyim oluyor. 

 Umarım inceleme yararlı olmuştur. Okuduğunuz için teşekkür ederim.
